titleStmt.title: A proclamation, diuised and made by the kinges hihgnes, by the aduise of his maiesties counsayle, the .xviii. daye of Decembre, in the .xxv. yere of his highnes reigne for restraint of wares and marchaundise to be conueyed and transported out of the frenche kynges dominions in to the realme of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet regis impressor excussit. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Proclamation banning import of goods from France.
Reproductions of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
